annotation.text: The point r comma theta in the polar coordinate system
The point r comma theta lying in the first quadrant
An arrow from the origin pointing up and right to the point, with its length labeled r
The angle between the x-axis and the arrow is labeled theta
A vertical dashed line segment from the x-axis to the point, labeled to be a distance of x horizontally from the origin.
A horizontal dashed line segment from the y-axis to the point, labeled to be a distance of y vertically from the origin.
The arc of a circle centered at the origin, on which the point lies
